position_adjustment:
Welcome to our study!

First we will be getting the keyboard setup calibrated to fit your typing height. Listen to the study administrator for instructions. Please do not press anything until directed to do so by the administrator.

Your codename for this study is:

pre_practices.practice_desc:
Time to practice for the physical keyboard.
The study administrator will now give a description of the physical keyboard and the practice task you are about to complete.

post_practice:
Thank you for doing your best to practice with the keyboard. If you feel it is possible that your typing could be further improved, please press "=" to go back to practice.
Once you press "return/enter", you CANNOT GO BACK to practice.
start_confirmation:
A typing task is about to begin.
Please take a moment to rest your arms and wrists by your side if needed.

- Task duration is 1 minute.
- Try to balance speed and accuracy.
- If you finish early, press "return/enter" button.
post_trial:
Thank you for taking time to think about your experience with this keyboard!
Next we will have you answer some surveys.
thank_you:
Thank you for taking time to think about your experience with this keyboard!
Next we will have you answer some surveys followed by an exit interview.
tlx_answer:
Thank you for completing the typing tasks for this trial!
Please listen to the study administrator's instructions as they guide you through a short oral questionnaire.
pre_exp_analysis:
Thank you for answering those questions!
We will now give you some time to focus on the experience of using this keyboard.
Please listen to the study administrator for instructions.
